pages.text: top of page Healthy and Delicious! Catering Menu Call 843-425-9965 if your ordering for next-day delivery or pick up CREOLE HIBACHI BAR CATERING DROP OFF Creole Hibachi Bar serves 10 to 15 pp Bourbon Chicken, Blackened Steak, Blackened Shrimp Served with Dirty rice and Hibachi soul veggies. Blackened Steak Hibachi Blackened Ribeye Steak served with, Greens, green beans, carrots,broccoli, cauliflower, Collards, and served with beef dirty rice. $15.95 Gluten free Hibachi Soul Bourbon St Chicken Blackened chicken tossed in bourbon St sauce and served with Greens, green beans, carrots,broccoli, Collards, cauliflower, served with beef dirty rice. $13.95 Gluten free Hibachi Soul Blackened Shrimp Blackened or fried Shrimp served with Greens, green beans, carrots, broccoli, cauliflower, Collard. and beef dirty rice. $14.95 Gluten free Bourbon St BBQ Pot Stickers 5 Chicken and vegetable pot sticker’s fried and tossed with our homemade Bourbon sauce. $6 Gluten free STARTERS Bourbon St BBQ Pot Stickers 5 Chicken and vegetable pot sticker’s fried and tossed with our homemade Bourbon sauce. $6 Gluten free Collards Green Egg Rolls Slow Cooked Collards with herbs and spices rolled in egg roll wrap. Served with Bourbon St Sauce $6 Vegetarian MAINS Our Hibachi section. 100% Customizable Blackened Steak Hibachi Blackened Ribeye Steak served with, Greens, green beans, carrots,broccoli, cauliflower, Collards, and served with beef dirty rice. $15.95 Gluten free Hibachi Soul Bourbon St Chicken Blackened chicken tossed in bourbon St sauce and served with Greens, green beans, carrots,broccoli, Collards, cauliflower, served with beef dirty rice. $13.95 Gluten free Hibachi Soul Blackened Shrimp Blackened or fried Shrimp served with Greens, green beans, carrots, broccoli, cauliflower, Collard. and beef dirty rice. $14.95 Gluten free Creole Combo Hibachi Mix your favorite meats! Pick 2 Chicken, steak and shrimp. $18.95 Gluten free Veggie Hibachi Seasonal vegetables Stir fry, Served with Perlo rice. $12.95 Vegetarian Vegan Bourbon St Pot Stickers Chicken or veggie pot stickers fried and tossed in a slap your mama bourbon sauce. $8 Vegetarian Southern Stir Fry Crab Rice Rice stir fried with Fresh blue crab, onions, bell peppers, southern spices and veggies $18.95 My New Option Shrimp $5 Charleston Ham Rice Smoked ham tossed with yellow rice, onions, bells, and Gullah spices, and served with Cajun veggies. $11.95 bottom of page

top of page Catering | Blackenese Soul Food Hibachi Food Truck Charleston SC Creole Soul Food Our Cuisine We source only the highest quality, seasonal, ingredients to create our delicious meals. Individual servings are packed in recyclable boxes CUSTOMIZE YOUR ORDER WE STRIVE TO PROVIDE A SOLUTION FOR ALL DIETARY NEEDS ​ Hibachi Soul Blackened Chicken ​ Creole blackened chicken seared to perfection tossed in a bourbon sauce served with collard, green beans, carrots, broccoli, cauliflower, and Perlo yellow rice ​ ​ ​ Hibachi Soul Blackened Ribeye Steak ​ Blackened Ribeye served with Fresh collard, green beans, carrots, broccoli, cauliflower, and Perlo rice ​ ​ ​ ​ Hibachi Soul Blackened Shrimp ​ Blackened shrimp served with collard , green beans, carrots, broccoli, cauliflower, and Perlo rice ​ ​ Contact Contact Us Food truck service Minimum is $750 BLACKENESEHIBACHI@GMAIL.COM TEL: 704 891 9222 Fill out this short contact form.
